name: @convadraw/wasm
description: WebAssembly module for CloudGrid high-performance canvas operations

scripts.build:debug: asc assembly/index.ts --target debug --outFile build/debug.wasm --exportRuntime --textFile build/debug.wat --bindings esm
scripts.build:release: asc assembly/index.ts --target release --outFile build/optimized.wasm --exportRuntime --optimize --textFile build/optimized.wat --bindings esm
scripts.build:all: npm run build:debug && npm run build:release
